description: Honeypot configuration for various services with distinct vulnerabilities.

services.description: HTTP service vulnerable to remote code execution due to input validation issues.
services.cve_description: Due to missing input validation during one step of the firmware update process, the product is vulnerable to remote code execution.

plugin.prompt: Respond to requests to update firmware.

services.description: SSH service with command injection vulnerability.
services.cve_description: Unauthenticated remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary system commands.

services.description: TCP service susceptible to information enumeration.
services.cve_description: This vulnerability potentially allows unauthorized enumeration of information from embedded device APIs.

services.description: HTTP service allowing local information disclosure due to improper input validation.
services.cve_description: This could lead to local information disclosure without additional execution privileges needed.

services.description: TCP service with potential out of bounds read vulnerability.
services.cve_description: This could lead to paired device information disclosure without additional execution privileges needed.
